scripts.test-html-reporter: npm run clean && playwright test cart.spec.js --reporter=html
scripts.test:reporter: npm run clean && playwright test DWATest.spec.js --project=chromium --headed --reporter=allure-playwright,line,./myallurereport.js
scripts.e2e: npm run clean && playwright test optimaRestoreFlow.spec.js --project=chromium --headed --reporter=allure-playwright,line,./myallurereport.js
